mapper.select: /* intrCoreInqy1021 : 전체 메뉴 조회 */ SELECT DATA.* , LEVEL AS LV FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_CD , M.MENUTYPE_CD , M.MENU_NM , M.UPPR_MENU_CD , UM.MENU_NM AS UPPR_MENU_NM , M.MAPPING_ID , M.USE_YN , M.DISP_ORDER , M.REMARK FROM MENU M LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU UM ON UM.MENU_CD = M.UPPR_MENU_CD WHERE 1=1 ) DATA START WITH DATA.UPPR_MENU_CD IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR DATA.MENU_CD = DATA.UPPR_MENU_CD ORDER SIBLINGS BY DATA.MENU_CD

/* intrCoreInqy1051 : 목록 건수 조회 */
SELECT COUNT(B.BRD_ID) AS LIST_CNT FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_INFO E ON B.EMP_IDX = E.EMP_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD AND O.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD AND R.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND B.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(B.BRD_TITLE),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND B.REG_DT >= REPLACE(#{srchSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND B.REG_DT <= REPLACE(#{srchEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(O.ORG_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{orgNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(R.RANK_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{rankNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(E.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
SELECT COUNT(M.MTG_CD) AS LIST_CNT FROM MEETING M LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_INFO E ON M.MTG_IDX = E.EMP_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD WHERE M.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(M.MTG_TITLE),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND M.MTG_DT = REPLACE(#{srchDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(O.ORG_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{orgNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(R.RANK_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{rankNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(E.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
SELECT COUNT(E.EMP_IDX) AS LIST_CNT FROM EMP_INFO E LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(E.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND E.HIRE_DT >= REPLACE(#{srchSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND E.HIRE_DT <= REPLACE(#{srchEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(O.ORG_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{orgNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(R.RANK_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{rankNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND E.LEAV_DT IS NULL
AND E.LEAV_DT IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(A.APRV_ID) AS LIST_CNT FROM APRVMAST A LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_INFO E ON E.EMP_IDX = A.REG_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD AND O.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD AND R.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TEMPLATE T ON T.TEMP_CD = A.TEMP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMCODE CC_STEP ON CC_STEP.COMMCODE_CD = A.APRVSTEP_CD WHERE 1=1
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(A.APRV_TITLE),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND A.REG_DT >= REPLACE(#{srchSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND A.REG_DT <= REPLACE(#{srchEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(O.ORG_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{orgNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(R.RANK_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{rankNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(E.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND A.APRVSTEP_CD = #{srchStepCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(P.PROJ_CD) AS LIST_CNT FROM PROJECT P LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_INFO E ON P.OWNER = E.EMP_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(E.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND T.REG_DT >= REPLACE(#{srchDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(O.ORG_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{orgNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(R.RANK_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{rankNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(E.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND P.STATUS = #{srchStatCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(T.TASK_ID) AS LIST_CNT FROM TASK T LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_INFO E ON T.EMP_IDX = E.EMP_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(E.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND T.REG_DT >= REPLACE(#{srchSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND T.REG_DT <= REPLACE(#{srchEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND T.REG_DT = REPLACE(#{srchDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
